mapper.select: SELECT c.cafeId, c.cafeName, c.cafePic, c.location, sub.distance FROM cafe c JOIN ( SELECT cafeId, ROUND(6371000 * ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{userLatitude})) * COS(RADIANS(latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(longitude) - RADIANS(#{userLongitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{userLatitude})) * SIN(RADIANS(latitude)))) AS distance FROM cafe ) sub ON c.cafeId = sub.cafeId AND sub.distance <= 1000 ORDER BY sub.distance
